languages.text: "Запрашиваю разрешение умилостивить уставших духов сего несчастного создания {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}". {n}Паскаль склоняется над когитатором. Негромкая мантра Механической Гармонии доносится из его вокс-системы, пока мехадендриты бережно, но быстро поворачивают рычаги и нажимают на клавиши приборной панели. Через несколько минут техножрец докладывает:{/n} "Исполнено. Доступ к архивам открыт".

traits.locale_text: "Запрашиваю разрешение умилостивить уставших духов сего несчастного создания {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}". {n}Паскаль склоняется над когитатором. Негромкая мантра Механической Гармонии доносится из его вокс-системы, пока мехадендриты бережно, но быстро поворачивают рычаги и нажимают на клавиши приборной панели. Через несколько минут техножрец докладывает:{/n} "Исполнено. Доступ к архивам открыт".

languages.text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."
languages.original_text: "Запрашиваю разрешение умилостивить уставших духов сего несчастного создания {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}". {n}Паскаль склоняется над когитатором. Негромкая мантра Механической Гармонии доносится из его вокс-системы, пока мехадендриты бережно, но быстро поворачивают рычаги и нажимают на клавиши приборной панели. Через несколько минут техножрец докладывает:{/n} "Исполнено. Доступ к архивам открыт".

traits.locale_text: "Requesting permission to appease the tired spirits of this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}". {n}Pasqual bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist the dials and push the buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the tech-priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

"Requesting permission to appease the tired spirits of this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}". {n}Pasqual bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist the dials and push the buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the tech-priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

"Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} ". {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

"Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

"Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

"Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

languages.text: «Solicitando permiso para aplacar a los fatigados espíritus de esta creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cogitador, su sistema voco entona un mantra de Armonía Mecánica mientras que sus mecadendritas giran diales y presionan botones en el panel de control con cuidado. Unos minutos después, el tecnosacerdote informa de lo siguiente:{/n} «Listo. Se ha concedido acceso a los archivos».
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: «Solicitando permiso para aplacar a los fatigados espíritus de esta creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cogitador, su sistema voco entona un mantra de Armonía Mecánica mientras que sus mecadendritas giran diales y presionan botones en el panel de control con cuidado. Unos minutos después, el tecnosacerdote informa de lo siguiente:{/n} «Listo. Se ha concedido acceso a los archivos».

languages.text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, die müden Geister in dieser Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} besänftigen zu dürfen." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über den Cogitator. Sein Voxsystem singt ein Mantra der Mechanischen Harmonie, während seine Mechadendriten sorgfältig auf dem Bedienfeld Knöpfe drehen und Tasten drücken. Einige Minuten später berichtet der Techpriester:{/n} "Es ist vollbracht. Zugang zu den Archiven wurde gewährt."
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, die müden Geister in dieser Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} besänftigen zu dürfen." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über den Cogitator. Sein Voxsystem singt ein Mantra der Mechanischen Harmonie, während seine Mechadendriten sorgfältig auf dem Bedienfeld Knöpfe drehen und Tasten drücken. Einige Minuten später berichtet der Techpriester:{/n} "Es ist vollbracht. Zugang zu den Archiven wurde gewährt."

languages.text: « Demande l'autorisation d'apaiser les esprits tourmentés dans cette création de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »{n}Pasqal se penche sur le cogitateur, son système-vox scandant un mantra d'harmonie mécanique, tandis que ses mécadendrites tournent délicatement des molettes et appuient sur divers boutons du panneau de contrôle. Au bout de quelques minutes, le technoprêtre annonce :{/n} « C'est fait. Accès aux archives accordé. »
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: « Demande l'autorisation d'apaiser les esprits tourmentés dans cette création de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »{n}Pasqal se penche sur le cogitateur, son système-vox scandant un mantra d'harmonie mécanique, tandis que ses mécadendrites tournent délicatement des molettes et appuient sur divers boutons du panneau de contrôle. Au bout de quelques minutes, le technoprêtre annonce :{/n} « C'est fait. Accès aux archives accordé. »

languages.text: “请允许我安抚{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}造物的疲惫灵魂。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身，照料者沉思者，他的音阵系统吟唱着象征和谐的机械祷文，机械触须小心翼翼地操作着控制面板上的转盘与按钮。几分钟后，他向你报告。{/n}“已经完成了，可以访问加密档案了。”
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我安抚{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}造物的疲惫灵魂。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身，照料者思考器，他的音阵系统吟唱着象征和谐的机械祷文，机械触须小心翼翼地操作着控制面板上的转盘与按钮。几分钟后，他向你报告。{/n}“已经完成了，可以访问加密档案了。”

languages.text: 「この{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の創造物のくたびれた精霊をなだめる許可を要求する」{n}パスカルは考算機の上にかがんで、機械触手で慎重にダイヤルを回し、コントロールパネルのボタンを押しながら、ヴォクスシステムから機械の調和のマントラを唱えた。数分後、技術司祭は報告する。{/n}「完了だ。アーカイブへのアクセスは許可された」
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: 「この{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の創造物のくたびれた精霊をなだめる許可をいただきたい」{n}パスカルは考算機の上にかがんで、機械触手で慎重にダイヤルを回し、コントロールパネルのボタンを押しながら、ヴォクスシステムから機械の調和のマントラを唱えた。数分後、技術司祭は報告する。{/n}「完了だ。アーカイブへのアクセスは許可された」
「この{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の創造物のくたびれた精霊をなだめる許可を要求する」{n}パスカルは考算機の上にかがんで、機械触手で慎重にダイヤルを回し、コントロールパネルのボタンを押しながら、ヴォクスシステムから機械の調和のマントラを唱えた。数分後、技術司祭は報告する。{/n}「完了だ。アーカイブへのアクセスは許可された」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} bu eserindeki yorgun ruhları yatıştırmak için izin istiyorum." {n}Pasqal, kavramsayarın üzerine eğiliyor. Mekadentritleri dikkatlice kontrol panelindeki kadranları çevirip düğmelere basarken voks sistemi, Mekanik Uyum düsturunu okuyor. Tekno Rahip, birkaç dakika sonra doğruluyor.{/n} "Tamamdır. Arşivlere erişim izni verildi."
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to appease the weary spirits in this creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}." {n}Pasqal bends over the cogitator, his vox-system chanting a mantra of Mechanical Harmony as his mechadendrites carefully twist dials and push buttons on the control panel. A few minutes later the Tech-Priest reports:{/n} "It is done. Access to the archives has been granted."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in bu eserindeki yorgun ruhları yatıştırmak için izin istiyorum." {n}Pasqal, kavramsayarın üzerine eğiliyor. Mekadentritleri dikkatlice kontrol panelindeki kadranları çevirip düğmelere basarken voks sistemi, Mekanik Uyum düsturunu okuyor. Tekno Rahip, birkaç dakika sonra doğruluyor:{/n} "Tamamdır. Arşivlere erişim izni verildi."
